ecoSpold:
<{{ activityDataset }}>
    
	  
        {{ activityName }}
		{% if synonyms %}{% for s in synonyms %}
		{{ s }}
		{% endfor %}{% endif %}
		{% if includedActivitiesStart %}
        {{ includedActivitiesStart }}
		{% endif %}
		{% if includedActivitiesEnd %}
        {{ includedActivitiesEnd }}
		{% endif %}
		{% if allocationComment %}
		
        {{ allocationComment }}
    	
		{% endif %}
		{% if generalComment %}
		
			{% for e in generalComment %}
			{{ e }}
        	{% endfor %}
		
		{% endif %}
		{% if tags %}{% for t in tags %}
		{{ t }}
		{% endfor %}{% endif %}
      
	  {% if classifications %}{% for c in classifications %}
	  {{ c }}
	  {% endfor %}{% endif %}
      
        {{ geography }}
		{% if geographyComment %}
		
        {{ geographyComment }}
		
		{% endif %}
      
      
        {% if technologyComment %}
		
        {{ technologyComment }}
		
		{% endif %}
      
      
      {% if timePeriodComment %}
		
        {{ timePeriodComment }}
		
		{% endif %}
	  
	  
        {{ macroEconomicScenarioName }}
		{% if macroEconomicScenarioComment %}{{ macroEconomicScenarioComment }}{% endif %}
      
    
	
	{% for exc in exchanges %}
	{{ exc }}{% endfor %}
	{% if parameters %}{% for p in parameters %}
	{{ p }}{% endfor %}
	{% endif %}
	
	{{ modellingAndValidation }}
	
	{{ dataEntryBy }}
	{{ dataGeneratorAndPublication }}
	{{ fileAttributes }}
	
{% if originalActivityDataset %}

	{{ originalActivityDataset }}

{% endif %}
</{{ activityDataset }}>
	{% if has_userMD %}

{% if ActivityNames %}{% for entry in ActivityNames %}
{{ entry }}
{% endfor %}{% endif %}
{% if Persons %}{% for entry in Persons %}
{{ entry }}
{% endfor %}{% endif %}
{% if Sources %}{% for entry in Sources %}
{{ entry }}
{% endfor %}{% endif %}
{% if Parameters %}{% for entry in Parameters %}
{{ entry }}
{% endfor %}{% endif %}
{% if ElementaryExchanges %}{% for entry in ElementaryExchanges %}
{{ entry }}
{% endfor %}{% endif %}
{% if IntermediateExchanges %}{% for entry in IntermediateExchanges %}
{{ entry }}
{% endfor %}{% endif %}
{% if ActivityIndex %}{% for entry in ActivityIndex %}
{{ entry }}
{% endfor %}{% endif %}
	{% endif %}
